summary: Silver at ~$77, crashed from ATH $121.62 on Jan 29. Extreme volatility (150% annualized). Structural supply deficit intact but paper market deleveraging ongoing.
content: Key facts: Current SI=F price ~$77. ATH $121.62 on Jan 29, 2026. 52-week range $28.31-$121.30. Jan 30 crash: 35% single-day drop. Feb 5 flash crash: 17% intraday. Analysts: Long Forecast April high $109.45. BofA target $135-309. Citigroup $150 within 3 months. Structural supply deficit of 160-200M oz. Industrial demand (solar, AI) structurally supportive.
